column1: #Text=Wednesday , November 28 , 2007
#Text=At the conclusion of the Annapolis Conference , United States President George W. Bush read a statement of joint understanding by Prime Minister Ehud Olmert , and President Mahmoud Abbas .
#Text=Commenting on the statement , President Bush said that :

#Text=" Today , Palestinians and Israelis each understand that helping the other to realize their aspirations is key to realizing their own aspirations — and both require an independent , democratic , viable Palestinian state .

#Text=Regarding the immediate future , the joint statement said :  President Abbas and Prime Minister Olmert will continue to meet on a bi-weekly basis to follow up the negotiations in order to offer all necessary assistance for their advancement .

#Text= It also set a target for an agreement : " We agree to engage in vigorous , ongoing and continuous negotiations , and shall make every effort to conclude an agreement before the end of 2008 .

_	_	_	_

#Text=Analysts , however , are skeptical that the two leaders , who are both politically weakened at home , will be able to reach an agreement by the deadline .

#Text= I am not persuaded yet that they have grasped the seriousness and the amount of work that is required to do what they say they want to do — to reach an agreement on the core issues by the end of the Bush administration , " said Aaron David Miller of the Woodrow Wilson Center .

column1: #Text=It 's going to be hard , but you had support in that room that you had not had from Arab states in the past .
#Text=— Condoleezza Rice
#Text=" Neither has the support at home or the control of his government to do something extremely serious , " said Jon Alterman , an analyst at the Center for Strategic and International Studies .
#Text="

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=There is , I think , considerable doubt remaining about whether the administration is prepared to take on the heavy lifting ... to make this work ,  said Bruce Riedel of the Brookings Institution .

#Text= This was an investment of presidential prestige that we had n't seen before , " said Daniel Levy of the New America Foundation .

column1: #Text=Levy saw reason for " very , very guarded optimism " and praised the commitments made by Abbas and Olmert .
#Text=Iran was notably absent from the list of conference participants .
#Text="

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=The Arabs have come here not because they love the Jews or even the Palestinians ,  an advisor to the Palestinian team told The New York Times on condition of anonymity .

#Text= It 's going to be hard , but you had support in that room [ in Annapolis ] that you had not had from Arab states in the past , " she said on television .

column1: #Text=Meanwhile , in the West Bank , hundreds protested the Annapolis Conference in conjunction with a funeral in Hebron .
#Text=They clashed with security forces who fired shots into the air to disperse the crowd .
#Text=At least 24 people have been reported injured .
#Text=Also , today , Israeli aircraft targeted a Hamas base in the Gaza Strip , killing two Hamas members and wounding more than 10 others , according to Palestinian officials .
